content: 36 sts round 18 single_crochet 4 decrease around 30 sts this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 19 single_crochet 3 decrease around 24 sts round 20 single_crochet around note begin stuffing the rest of the head and the body until mostly full round 21 single_crochet 2 decrease around 18 sts round 22 single_crochet decrease around 12 sts round 23 decrease around 6 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail finish stuffing body use the yarn needle to sew the hole shut weave in ends aaaarrrrmmmmssss make 2 start with skin tone color work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3-5 single_crochet around change to pajama color and continue round 6-7 single_crochet around round 8 single_crochet 2 decrease around 9sts round 9-15 single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff arms use the yarn needle to sew the hole shut sew arms to body between 1-2 rounds of the pajamas this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com lllleeeeggggssss make 2 start with pajama color chain 1 at beginning of the row does not count as a single_crochet chain 5 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chin from the hook single_crochet in next 2 chs 5 single_crochet in last chain working on the bottom of the row single_crochet in next 2 sts 4 single_crochet in last slip_stitch to first single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet 14 sts do not turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch single_crochet in next single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet in next* single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat form * to * slip_stitch to first single_crochet 20 sts row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet in next 2 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet in next 6 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet in next 2 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet in next 2 slip_stitch to first single_crochet 24 sts row 4-5 chain 1 single_crochet around row 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch and next single_crochet decrease 5 times single_crochet around 19 sts row 7 ch1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch decrease dc3tog decrease single_crochet around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 15 sts row 8-11 chain 1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch and around slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 12 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3sc decrease around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 12 sts row 13-17 ch1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch and around slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 18 chain 1 single_crochet in next
